nodes.text: Thulpin Agriculture was the largest agriculture corporation on the agriworld Draenell's Point. It was based in Thulpin City, on the Mee'r continent, and handled the distribution of the planet's crops for the hundreds of independent farmers. During the Galactic Civil War, an Alliance to Restore the Republic agent on the planet posed as a Galactic Sales Representative for Thulpin Agriculture. During a conversation with an Imperial Food Inspector, the agent learned of a pending Imperial project in the Bissillirus system, which was discovered to be the construction of the Bissillirus Resupply Base.
